description: Demolition of an existing rear extension, erection of a single storey side and rear extension, installation of 3nos.rooflights to ground floor single story rear extension and 2nos. UPVC casement windows into side elevation of new ground floor rear extension. Internal alterations.
decision_conditions: The proposed development, by reason of its excessive scale, siting and design, would fail to appear subordinate or proportionate to the host dwelling and be unduly visible from the streetscene resulting in an unacceptable harm to the character and  appearance of the dwelling and immediate area. The proposal is therefore contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2021.

By reason of its siting and combined height and depth along the shared boundary, the proposed single storey rear and side extension is considered to have an overbearing impact  and result in undue loss of daylight to the neighbouring properties at 259 Malden Road and is thereby contrary to Policy D3 of London Plan  2021  and Policies CS8 and DM10  in the Core Strategy .
